tool_description:
RESTful web service to access information, pictures, and more from the movie database.

Get Title, Year, Metascore Rating, Release date, Runtime, Genre, Directors, Writers, Actors, Plot, Awards, Posters, IMDB ID, Type, DVD, Boxoffice, Production company, website and response data.
name: Movie Database Alternative
title: Movie Database Alternative

api_list.name: By Search
By ID or Title
api_list.description: Search for Movies by ID or Title

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Type of result to return: (movie, series, episode)

optional_parameters.name: plot
optional_parameters.description: Return short or full plot: (short, full)

optional_parameters.name: r
optional_parameters.description: The data type to return: (json, xml)
